jsonSchema.description: A scan to be processed by a reader

micronsPerMotorStep.description: How many microns the stage (or objective) will travel along the X/Y/Z directions per step of the motor

movementLimitMicrons.description: The distance in microns that the stage (X/Y) or the objective (Z) can move before it hits the limit.

cameraTopLeftApprox.description: The coordinate of the top left corner of the camera's fov.

cameraBottomRightApprox.description: The coordinate of the top left corner of the camera's fov.

defaultZ.description: The default Z value for the stage.

imageMirrorX.description: Should the image be mirrored along the X axis prior to processing?

imageMirrorY.description: Should the image be mirrored along the Y axis prior to processing?

imageRotation.description: Rotate the image this many degrees clockwise prior to processing?

mockImageTopLeft.description: The coordinate of the top left corner of the mock image.

mockImageBottomRight.description: The coordinate of the bottom right corner of the mock image.
